name: qrscan-pwa
description: A simple offline QR code scanner as a progressive web application, works offline, no ads, no trackers, free & open-source.
author: Kutsan Kaplan <me@kutsankaplan.com> (https://kutsankaplan.com)

scripts.prestart: npm run format && npm run lint
scripts.format: npm run format:stylelint && npm run format:prettier
scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:stylelint
scripts.deploy: NODE_ENV=production npm run build && gh-pages --dist 'dist' --branch 'release' --message "chore: deploy $(git describe --abbrev=0 --tags)"
